1.subquestion: Define another variable $w := 2x - y,$ so that our new objective becomes finding the minimum possible values of $w^2 - 2y^2 - 3y.$ This optimization problem involves which three types of conic sections or quadratic surfaces if plotted in appropriate dimensions?
